hero.headline: OpenAI Quietly Adopts Skills System Across ChatGPT and Codex CLI
hero.summary: OpenAI has been silently integrating a 'skills' system into both ChatGPT and the Codex CLI, mirroring Claude Code's approach to extensibility. Skills inject custom instructions and context into AI conversations, allowing users to define persistent expertise areas like code review, documentation writing, or domain-specific knowledge.
hero.whyItMatters: This convergence signals that skills/plugins are becoming the standard paradigm for AI customization across platforms. Prompt engineers who master skill creation will have portable expertise across Claude Code, Codex CLI, and ChatGPT. The 'write once, use everywhere' dream for AI tooling is becoming real.

topStories.title: AGENTS.md Explodes: Open Standard for Guiding Coding Agents Gains 791 Stars Today
topStories.summary: The AGENTS.md format, donated by OpenAI to the Agentic AI Foundation, is rapidly gaining adoption. It provides a simple markdown-based way to instruct AI coding agents about repository conventions, constraints, and preferences - creating a universal language for agent configuration.

topStories.title: Gemini CLI Gets Intelligent Model Routing: Flash for Simple, Pro for Complex
topStories.summary: Gemini CLI v0.20+ now automatically routes queries to the optimal model - Flash handles simple requests while Pro tackles complex analytical tasks. This 'model routing' approach extends your API quota while maintaining quality, potentially reshaping how developers think about model selection.

topStories.title: Mistral Releases Vibe CLI: Minimal Conversational Coding Agent
topStories.summary: Mistral launched mistral-vibe, a minimal CLI coding agent designed for conversational development workflows. The tool emphasizes simplicity and direct interaction, offering an alternative approach to the feature-rich agents from Anthropic and OpenAI.

topStories.title: Anthropic Publishes Claude Code Hooks Power User Guide
topStories.summary: Anthropic's official blog published a comprehensive guide on Claude Code hooks customization. The article details how to use PreToolUse, PostToolUse, and Stop hooks for workflow automation, including input modification capabilities added in v2.0.10 for transparent sandboxing and secret redaction.

trendingRepos.name: thedotmack/claude-mem
trendingRepos.description: Claude Code plugin that automatically captures session activity, compresses it with AI using Claude's agent-sdk, and injects relevant context into future sessions. 658 stars gained today.

trendingRepos.name: agentsmd/agents.md
trendingRepos.description: AGENTS.md - a simple, open format for guiding coding agents. Donated to the Agentic AI Foundation as the standard for instructing AI agents about repository conventions.

trendingRepos.name: refly-ai/refly
trendingRepos.description: Vibe Workflow Platform for Non-technical Creators. Visual canvas for building AI workflows without code, combining nodes for prompts, models, and integrations.

trendingRepos.name: infiniflow/ragflow
trendingRepos.description: Leading open-source RAG engine fusing cutting-edge retrieval-augmented generation with agent capabilities. Creates superior context layers for LLMs with 111 stars today.

trendingSkills.name: Frontend Design
trendingSkills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Covers component architecture, responsive layouts, and modern CSS patterns.

trendingSkills.name: Claude API Patterns
trendingSkills.description: Anthropic Claude API development patterns, tool use, Agent SDK, prompt engineering, and best practices for building with Claude programmatically.

trendingSkills.name: LangGraph Orchestration
trendingSkills.description: LangGraph low-level agent orchestration. Build stateful, durable agents with graphs, persistence, streaming, and complex multi-step workflows.

trendingSkills.name: Game Generator
trendingSkills.description: Generate GameSpec JSON and Lua scripts for AI Game Platform supporting multiple game types. Turn natural language into playable game logic.

newMcpServers.name: schemacrawler-ai
newMcpServers.description: Natural language interaction with database schemas. Explore tables, columns, foreign keys, triggers, and stored procedures by asking questions like 'Explain the interest calculation stored procedure'. Ideal for DBAs and data analysts.

newMcpServers.name: morningstar-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Power AI apps with Morningstar's trusted financial content. Access global analyst research, market analysis, and key investment data through AI assistants.

newMcpServers.name: vectra-ai-rux-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Connect AI assistants to Vectra AI security platform for intelligent threat analysis and automated incident response. Enterprise security meets agentic AI.

newMcpServers.name: unreal-engine-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Control Unreal Engine via Remote Control API. Enable AI assistants to automate game development tasks, scene manipulation, and asset management in UE5.

notableHooks.name: Input Modification Hooks
notableHooks.description: New in v2.0.10: PreToolUse hooks can modify tool inputs before execution. Intercept commands and let execution proceed with corrected parameters - enabling transparent sandboxing, automatic dry-run flags, and secret redaction.

notableHooks.name: Bash Command Logger
notableHooks.description: Log every Bash command Claude executes to a file with timestamps. Uses jq to extract command and description from tool input, perfect for audit trails and debugging agent behavior.

notableHooks.name: Protected File Blocker
notableHooks.description: Block edits to sensitive files like .env, package-lock.json, and .git directories. Returns exit code 2 to feed the error back to Claude for automatic handling.

tuiTools.name: yazi
tuiTools.description: Blazing fast terminal file manager in Rust with async I/O. Features image previews, bulk operations, and vim-like keybindings. The modern alternative to ranger.

tuiTools.name: posting
tuiTools.description: Powerful HTTP client that lives in your terminal. Built with Textual (Python) for API testing without leaving the command line. Beautiful, productive, keyboard-driven.

tuiTools.name: rainfrog
tuiTools.description: Database management TUI supporting Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite. Query, browse, and manage databases with a beautiful ratatui-powered interface.

tuiTools.name: lazydocker
tuiTools.description: The lazier way to manage everything Docker. From the creator of lazygit, navigate containers, images, volumes, and networks with keyboard-driven efficiency.

AI News: GPT-5.2, Devstral 2, Boom Superpower, MCP Nonprofit and more!
Verdent AI just made vibe coding devs unstoppable!

highlights: IME support enhanced - correctly positioning composition window for CJK input methods
Disallowed MCP tools now hidden from model for improved security
Fixed issue where steering messages could be lost while subagent is working
Gemini 3 support rolled out to all API key, Pro, and Ultra users
Intelligent model routing - Flash for simple, Pro for complex queries
New extensions ecosystem from Google, Dynatrace, Figma, Postman, Shopify, Snyk, Stripe
GPT-5.2 introduced with improvements across knowledge, reasoning, and coding
Skills system integration - inject SKILL.md content into conversations
Cloud exec --branch for remote runs with status/diff/apply flows

notableQuotes.quote: The Skills system in Codex works similarly to Claude Code's skills feature. You can define a SKILL.md file that gets injected into the conversation context, providing domain-specific instructions and knowledge.
notableQuotes.author: Simon Willison

notableQuotes.quote: Gemini CLI will now intelligently pick the best model for the task. Simple queries go to Flash while complex analytical or creative tasks use the power of Pro. This ensures your quota lasts longer.
notableQuotes.author: Google AI Team

notableQuotes.quote: Developers using byLLM completed tasks over three times faster and wrote 45% fewer lines of code compared to manual prompt engineering frameworks like DSPy.
notableQuotes.author: TechXplore

prompt: Daily AI news digest for December 13, 2025. Hero: OpenAI quietly adopts skills system across ChatGPT and Codex CLI, mirroring Claude Code's extensibility paradigm. Top stories: AGENTS.md explodes with 791 stars as the open standard for guiding coding agents, Gemini CLI gets intelligent model routing (Flash for simple, Pro for complex), Mistral releases minimal vibe CLI coding agent, Anthropic publishes Claude Code hooks power user guide. Fresh trending repos: claude-mem (658 stars today), agents.md (791 stars), refly (workflow platform), ragflow (RAG engine). New skills from SkillsMP: frontend-design, claude-api patterns, langgraph orchestration, game-generator. MCP servers: schemacrawler-ai (natural language database queries), morningstar (financial data), vectra-ai (security), unreal-engine (game dev). Notable hooks: input modification, bash logger, protected file blocker. TUI tools: yazi, posting, rainfrog, lazydocker. Tool updates: Claude Code 2.0.69, Gemini CLI 0.20.2, Codex 0.71.0 with GPT-5.2 and skills.
